summary:
Adds a ring with all necessary enchantments for playing.
Can be used for wearing whatever armor you want and still having all effects.
descriptionHtml:
WARNING: This mod is not balanced at all.

IMPORTANT: Unequip the ring before upgrading to the next version or your save file can get bugged! Unequip the ring before uninstalling or your character will gain its stats for permanent!

NMM compatible.

When I started to switch between some nice armors of different modders all over this site I got bored by crafting, fortifying, enchanting and so on everytime to get back to the stats needed to be able to still kill stuff. So i added a ring for me to have all the stats needed to play whatever I want. A mate of mine then wanted this thing too and asked me to upload it, so here it is.

There is a light and a heavy version of it and it can be crafted at a forge out of nothing. (Not lore friendly? well idc.)
Even if the inventory model is a silver ring it does not use the ring equipment slot and has no equipment model.
I know this can be abused very easily, but it's your decision what to do with it.

Here's a full list of all stats given by the ring:
Base armor rating of 600. (cap)
Spells cost 100% less to cast.
All Weapons deal 200% increased damage.
Increases carrying capacity by 200.
Resist 100% of magic/frost/shock damage. (cap is still 85%)
Resist 200% of fire damage. (to reach cap as a vampire)
Resist 100% of poison damage.
Can fortify weapons and armors 100% better. (same as a full set of this w/o alchemy)
Unarmed strikes deal 100 additional damage.
Resist 100% of diseases.
Take no falling damage. (Note: Does not affect your horse.)
Can breathe under water.
Sneak attacks with one handed melee weapons do double damage.
Created potions are 100% more powerful.
Prices are 50% better.
Time between shouts is reduced 20%.
Block 100% more damage with your shield. (cap is 85%)

As requested I added another more overpowered ring into the game, the "Imba Ring (plus)" with additional stats, you can wear both at a time, but this one has no longer the 'replacer' effect of the first, its stats are those:
Become invisible while sneaking. (Bugs if used with the Shadow Warrior perk.)
Move silently.
Increases Health/Stamina by 500.
Increases Health/Stamina regen by 250%.
While sneaking you are 500% harder to detect.

Any other wishes? Let me know.
author: Blut

files.name: Imba Ring v1.1
files.changelogHtml:
No longer uses the ring slot, has no equipment model.
added enchantment: Can breathe under water.

files.name: Imba Ring v1.2
files.changelogHtml:
Added stab damage of the Dark Brotherhoods gloves.
Added alchemy enchantment.
Added Price enchantment.
